definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: You spend one-second of the monthly expense on body-building .
sentences.chinese: 你將月開銷的二分之一用於健身運動。

sentences.english: Why we use max-flow method to solve maximum bipartite matching?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們用最大流方法求解最大二分匹配？

sentences.english: Such dichotomies lie at the heart of the geoengineering problem.
sentences.chinese: 這種二分法是地球工程問題的核心。

sentences.english: Secondhand smoke causes at least half the cases of lung cancer in non-smokers.
sentences.chinese: 二手菸會導致至少二分之一的不吸菸者致癌。

sentences.english: The boy set off at 6:02 in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 男孩於早上六點零二分出發。

sentences.english: The original call was at eight thirty-two.
sentences.chinese: 第一個電話是在八點三十二分。

sentences.english: Avoid grand dichotomies such as the performance of NGOs vs. government.
sentences.chinese: 避免大的二分法，例如非政府組織相對於政府的表現。

sentences.english: The lightest-weight stars are red dwarfs. They can be as small as one-twelfth the mass of our Sun.
sentences.chinese: 最輕的是紅矮星，它們只有太陽質量的十二分之一。

sentences.english: Moreover, of the amount spent on the sports venues, the government shoulders only about one-half.
sentences.chinese: 而且，政府只承擔了二分之一的體育場館建設費用。

sentences.english: As a result, dyad spores formed.
Nine fifty-two on the clock above the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 冰箱上的鐘已指到九點五十二分。

sentences.english: How can we escape such useless dichotomies?
sentences.chinese: 我們怎樣才能從這些毫無意義的二分法中掙脫出來？

sentences.english: Each animal also represents two hours or one-twelfth of every day.
sentences.chinese: 並且代表一天中的十二分之一，也就是兩個小時。

sentences.english: The odds are about one in twelve that a child will be colorblind .
sentences.chinese: 色盲在兒童中的比例是十二分之一。

sentences.english: The Chinese industry produces about half of these made in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國生產的外置電源佔全世界總產量的二分之一左右。

sentences.english: The ground is already being prepared for two bogus dichotomies.
sentences.chinese: 爲兩種虛假二分法登臺的舞臺已經準備停當。

definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
(gold or silver) of standard purity/(fig.) fine
copper coin of the Ming and Qing Dynasties
ratio seventy to thirty/thirty percent failure, seventy percent success
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
